page_content:
__

#### Planning, Permitting and Construction Alert:

# NVBIA NAIOP Fairfax Committee Meetings

The NVBIA-NAIOP-Fairfax Committee Meeting is a collaboration between members of Northern Virginia Building Industry Association (NVBIA), NAIOP Northern Virginia (NAIOP) and Fairfax County. The monthly industry meetings are attended by members of NVBIA, NAIOP and various Fairfax County land development agencies to include; Department of Public Works and Environmental Services, Land Development Services, Department of Planning and Development, Office of the Fire Marshal, Virginia Department of Transportation, Fairfax County Department of Transportation, Office of Community Revitalization, Health Department, Engineers & Surveyors Institute, and the Office of the County Executive. This collaborative meeting affords all who attend an opportunity to network with industry, meet county officials and discuss/resolve issues that are relevant to our industries.
